snippet.title: Astral Rot - Trailer
snippet.description:
Astral Rot

Astral Rot is a fixed camera, survival horror sci-fi game by the co-creators of Tormented Souls. You play as Adler, a space mining engineer, that will have to face impossible choices in order to save his brother and anyone in the asteroid that hasn't been infected by the Stardust Disease.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2474170/Astral_Rot/
Redes/Socials/Redes Sociais: https://twitter.com/AbstractDw https://www.twitch.tv/abstractdigital https://www.instagram.com/abstract_dw/
